question_text: Have you participated in any competitions before?
Did you win or become runner up in any competition?
Do you have any elder sibling or cousin?
If yes which field or stream are they studying or working in?
If no then which three streams would you like to choose?
Why do you want to choose those streams?
Do you like Biology and want to become a doctor?
Are you scared of injections blood or operations?
Do you have patience to explain things to others repeatedly?
Would you like to become a teacher or mentor in future?
Which subject do you understand better Maths or Science?
Do you enjoy solving numerical problems?
Do you prefer understanding concepts or memorising answers?
Do you like reading history economics or social topics?
Do you feel comfortable speaking in front of a class?
How many hours can you study daily without getting tired?
Are you comfortable with competitive exams and pressure?
Do you prefer practical work or theory based study?
